content.text:
Living sustainably – also when on holiday

Interhome Group is committed to sustainable holiday home tourism. We have therefore made it our priority to check the sustainability of our 40,000 approx. holiday homes and holiday apartments. For this purpose, we have defined 12 criteria of our own, which are particularly important to us in terms of environmental protection and the conservation of resources:

content.textLeft:
• 100% renewable electricity
  • Solar panels or photovoltaic system
  • 100% ecological heating system
  • E-charging station available on the property
  • Recycling bins available and recycling station in the locality
  • At least 80% of the lighting is LED
  • All windows are at least double glazed
  • Water-efficient toilets
  • Water-efficient showers
  • No disposable tableware
  • Green areas available in the form of a garden or rooftop garden
  • Public transport within walking distance up to a max. 1 km

content.text:
If a holiday home or apartment fulfils 7 of our 12 features, the accommodation is marked with a green tree icon. You will find the most important features that your sustainable holiday home fulfils in the description of the accommodation.

Find sustainable holiday accommodation with new filter function

If sustainability is important for you when looking for a holiday home or if you would like accommodation with an e-charging station, you can use the filter for "sustainable accommodation" and "e-charging station" in the search criteria on our website.
We wish you a wonderful and "sustainable" stay in one of our holiday apartments or holiday homes!
